title: Is Abstinence in a Man Attractive?
itunes:title: Is Abstinence in a Man Attractive?
description:
Tuesday 6/10 - Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to have some of our listeners call up for our segment "Shoot Your Shot", and lets just say this caller didn't know how to take no for an answer. Speaking of taking no for an answer, would you be able to take a man serious if he wanted to be abstinent? We had our ladies call up to see if they would be able to handle a man sustaining from sex. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to three employees of a Georgia senior living community for making a Snapchat video instead of monitoring a resident, that ended up having a stroke.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 6/10 - Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to have some of our listeners call up for our segment "Shoot Your Shot", and lets just say this caller didn't know how to take no for an answer. Speaking of taking no for an answer, would you be able to take a man serious if he wanted to be abstinent? We had our ladies call up to see if they would be able to handle a man sustaining from sex. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to three employees of a Georgia senior living community for making a Snapchat video instead of monitoring a resident, that ended up having a stroke.
